# Business Plugins

# Setup

## Python

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import semantic_kernel as sk
from semantic_kernel.connectors.ai.open_ai import AzureChatCompletion, OpenAIChatCompletion
from IPython.display import display, Markdown
```
:::


## Kernel

::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
kernel = sk.Kernel()

api_key, org_id = sk.openai_settings_from_dot_env()

kernel.add_text_completion_service(
    "openai", OpenAIChatCompletion("gpt-3.5-turbo", api_key, org_id))

print("A kernel is now ready.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
A kernel is now ready.
```
:::
:::


# Business Plugins

## Business goals

1. Grow the existing business
2. Save money and time
3. Add completely new business
4. Prepare for the unknown

## Activate plugins

::: {.cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pluginsDirectory = "../plugins-sk"

pluginBT = kernel.import_semantic_skill_from_directory(
    pluginsDirectory, "BusinessThinking")
```
:::


# Cost Efficiency 

## Input strengths and weaknesses

::: {.cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
strengths = ["Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards", "Owner trained in Sicily at some of the best pizzerias",
             "Strong local reputation", "Prime location on university campus"]

weaknesses = ["High staff turnover", "Floods in the area damaged the seating areas that are in need of repair",
              "Absence of popular calzones from menu", "Negative reviews from younger demographic for lack of hip ingredients"]
```
:::


## Context

::: {.cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_context = kernel.create_new_context()

my_context['input'] = 'makes pizzas'
my_context['strengths'] = ", ".join(strengths)
my_context['weaknesses'] = ", ".join(weaknesses)
```
:::


## Run kernel with cost efficiency plugin

::: {.cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
costefficiency_result = await kernel.run_async(pluginBT["SeekCostEfficiency"], input_context=my_context)
```
:::


## Output

::: {.cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
costefficiency_str = str(
    "### ‚ú® Suggestions for how to gain cost efficiencies\n" + str(costefficiency_result))
```
:::


. . .

::: {.cell output-location='slide' execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
display(Markdown(costefficiency_str))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
### ‚ú® Suggestions for how to gain cost efficiencies
| Title | Strength | Weakness | Description |
| ----- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Streamlining operations | Strong local reputation | High staff turnover | Implementing efficient processes and systems to reduce the need for excessive staff and minimize turnover |
| Renovating seating areas | Prime location on university campus | Flood damage to seating areas | Investing in repairs and renovations to attract more customers and improve the dining experience |
| Expanding menu options | Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards | Absence of popular calzones from menu | Adding popular calzones to the menu to attract a wider range of customers and increase sales |
:::
:::


# Business Strategy

## Input opportunities and threats

::: {.cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
opportunities = ["Untapped catering potential", "Growing local tech startup community",
                 "Unexplored online presence and order capabilities", "Upcoming annual food fair"]

threats = ["Competition from cheaper pizza businesses nearby", "There's nearby street construction that will impact foot traffic",
           "Rising cost of cheese will increase the cost of pizzas", "No immediate local regulatory changes but it's election season"]
```
:::


## Import plugin

::: {.cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pluginBT = kernel.import_semantic_skill_from_directory(
    pluginsDirectory, "BusinessThinking")
```
:::


## Context

::: {.cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_context = kernel.create_new_context()

my_context['input'] = 'makes pizzas'
my_context['strengths'] = ", ".join(strengths)
my_context['weaknesses'] = ", ".join(weaknesses)
my_context['opportunities'] = ", ".join(opportunities)
my_context['threats'] = ", ".join(threats)
```
:::


## Run kernel 

::: {.cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bizstrat_result = await kernel.run_async(pluginBT["BasicStrategies"], input_context=my_context)
```
:::


## Output

::: {.cell execution_count=13}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bizstrat_str = "## ‚ú® Business strategy thinking based on SWOT analysis\n" + \
    str(bizstrat_result)
```
:::


. . .

::: {.cell output-location='slide' execution_count=14}
``` {.python .cell-code}
display(Markdown(bizstrat_str))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
## ‚ú® Business strategy thinking based on SWOT analysis
### Building on strengths can immediately improve the business

| Title | Strength | Weakness | Description |
| ----- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Expand menu with popular calzones | Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards | Absence of popular calzones from menu | Add popular calzones to the menu to attract customers who are looking for a different type of pizza option |
| Improve seating areas | Strong local reputation, Prime location on university campus | Floods in the area damaged the seating areas that are in need of repair | Invest in repairing and renovating the seating areas to provide a comfortable and inviting space for customers |
| Enhance online presence and marketing | Strong local reputation | Negative reviews from younger demographic for lack of hip ingredients | Develop a strong online presence through social media, website, and online advertising to reach a wider audience and showcase the unique aspects of the business |

### Taking advantage of opportunities whenever possible

| Title | Opportunity | Description |
| ----- | -------- | ----------- |
| Launch catering services | Untapped catering potential | Tap into the potential market for catering services by offering customized pizza options for events, parties, and corporate functions |
| Develop online ordering capabilities | Unexplored online presence and order capabilities | Create a user-friendly online ordering system to cater to the growing trend of online food ordering and delivery services |
| Participate in the upcoming annual food fair | Upcoming annual food fair | Showcase the unique garlic pizza recipe and attract new customers by participating in the local food fair, offering special discounts and promotions |

### Building resilience to threats is always a good idea

| Title | Threat | Description |
| ----- | -------- | ----------- |
| Enhance cost management strategies | Rising cost of cheese will increase the cost of pizzas | Implement cost-saving measures such as negotiating better deals with suppliers, optimizing ingredient usage, and exploring alternative cheese options to mitigate the impact of rising costs |
| Diversify customer base | Competition from cheaper pizza businesses nearby | Target different customer segments such as families, students, and professionals by offering meal deals, loyalty programs, and personalized promotions to differentiate from cheaper competitors |
| Stay updated on local regulatory changes | No immediate local regulatory changes but it's election season | Monitor local regulatory changes and stay informed about potential impacts on the business, such as changes in zoning, licensing, or taxation, to proactively adapt and comply with any new regulations |
:::
:::
